file_content.text: Trespasser. Defiler. Avatar destroyer. My domain. My realm. My strength.
Trespasser. Defiler. My domain. My realm. My strength.
Torment. Suffering. Despair. Death!
Violence. Suffering. Death. Sel-Makor feeds on the fallen.
Why were you working with the Sith? Are you an ally of the Emperor?
You helped Fulminiss.
Sel-Makor has no allies. Fulminiss promised bloodshed. Madness. Death of Voss and Gormak.
Are you a living creature? Or part of the planet?
What are you?
Sel-Makor is the Dark Heart. Despair. Hopelessness. Death.
I saved you. I gave you Valen-Da. Where's my reward?
Give me my reward.
Jedi offered Mystic. Sel-Makor promised power. Reward given.
Corruption spreads. Voss. Gormak. Twisted. Broken. Servants of Sel-Makor!
My domain. My world. Go. Leave. Never return.
I think you might have picked the wrong side on this one.
This thing is pure evil! We should have smashed its face!
Sel-Makor = evil // Jedi = destroy
I came here to stop Fulminiss from completing the Emperor's ritual. Who cares if this thing eventually corrupts this entire world?
Relax. I don't care if you corrupt this entire world. I just wanted to stop Fulminiss from completing the Emperor's ritual.
Haha!
